forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind around 13 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 66. West wind 12 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the early hours of Sunday unfold over Boston, the air is wrapped in a muted embrace, marked by a blanket of mostly cloudy skies that cradles the city in a gentle shroud. The temperature lingers in the low fifties, providing a crispness that seems to whisper promises of warmth in the day ahead. With a steady west wind rustling through the trees, at around thirteen miles per hour, the atmosphere carries a refreshing edge — a reminder that while the world still sleeps, nature is stirring.

The forecast hints at a transformation as the day progresses. Soon, the clouds will part, revealing a tapestry of blue as the sun stretches to greet us, warming the air and awakening the spirit with a high approaching the mid-sixties. Gusty winds will dance through the streets, occasionally surging up to twenty-eight miles per hour, which may sway the city’s proudest trees and toss light jackets about like autumn leaves. As the sun claims its place in the sky, it invites a palette of activities that embrace the essence of a weekend in early June. A stroll along the river, perhaps, invigorated by the gentle breeze, or a visit to one of the many parks, where one might linger over coffee and a good book. Dress in layers; a light jacket will serve you well in the cool morning hours, yielding to the warm embrace of the afternoon sun. 

Whether one finds pleasure in savoring the intricate details of nature or engaging in the pulse of urban life, Boston stands ready to offer a splendid day, poignant in its simplicity yet vivid in its opportunities.
